duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, process, and move merchandise according to established guidelines to meet department standards
Work independently and in a team, as assigned, and move between job functions as needed
Practice safety awareness; order consolidation, picking, packing, replenishment, shipping, receiving, inventorying, and re-warehousing
Provide and process information in response to inquiries, concerns, and/or requests about products and services
Have a basic understanding of current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMPs)
Load and unload trailers, scan merchandise, build pallets, label merchandise, pick, pack, and sort products
Re-bag/Re-ticket, replenish and/or stock merchandise as needed; verify accuracy of production or location; may set or assign locations of products
Perform manual, computer or RF functions to enter data in systems; perform count of product/reconciliations (count cycle)
Adhere to company policies and procedures; follow department training guidelines, best practices, and operating procedures; keep work area neat and clean
Maintain standards of appearance according to department dress code; work well with fellow Associates, Leads, Supervisors, and Managers
Follow all location Safety Guidelines; ensure equipment, skids, slips, and other department supplies are maintained

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or combination of education and equivalent work experience
